title: Darling Psycho
description: THE PATIENCE OF A SOULLESS MONSTER IS ENDLESS. You can’t make a good guy out of a biker enforcer.Fortunately, for all concerned, Lawless had no interest in being one.Blackmail brought his projects forward.Vengeance kept his brain sharp.Lust and hunger made his hollowed-out heart thud. DID YOU COME LOOKING FOR A FAIRYTALE?YOU’VE TAKEN A WRONG TURN. THIS ISN’T THE PLACE. He’s been called many things. Monster suited him.And you know what? The monster was ready for a playmate.Lawless didn’t feel guilty for his manipulating ways.Could he love?Or was he only obsessed with the woman he’d helped make strong? He’d protected her.Sought retribution in her name.Watched. Manipulated. Claimed.Did that equate to love?For an empty man, Lawless was feeling so much.And now it was time to bring her into the dark with him.  READY TO BE INSIDE THE HEART OF A SELF-CONFESSED PSYCHOPATH? Then get ready for the ride, fish.
author: V. Theia
